text:
It sais:
"
 Download the JavaMail API.

This download includes 2 vital libraries for the configuration; activation.jar
and mail.jar. 
"

The javamail api which you can currently download does not contain activation.jar.
creator: Michiel.Meeuwissen@gmail.com

text: Page updated and clarified.  Thanks for pointing this out.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
